military signals Provided highlevel functional requirements for the development of a computer program designed to increase analysts productivity by 25 Supervised and trained 2 analysts Briefed management weekly with reports and analytical findings NETWORK ADMINISTRATOR UNITED STATES ARMY May 2010 to September 2013 Provided WAN support by administering Communications Security COMSEC to over
